response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value for you, just like it does for us. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We believe this is a fair and competitive offer, allowing you to acquire this valuable asset without overextending your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 750000}
